colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,(CES RIGS SUM CU RTZA DRUG MCHOD PA'I CHO GA DNGOS GRUB 'DOD 'JO DPAG BSAM LJON PA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SNGAGS RAMS PA BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN DAR GYIS SLOB MA RNAMS LA RIGS LDAN 'JAM DPAL GRAGS PA'I DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I BSDUS PA'I RGYUD DANG, RIGS LDAN PAD MA DKAR PO'I 'GREL CHEN DRI MED 'OD GNYIS BU STON RIN PO CHE'I MCHAN DANG SBRAGS PA'I BSHAD PA BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI BLA MA RNAMS KYI BSHAD RGYUN LTAR THOB PA'I LTAR THOB PA'I STENG BU STON RIN PO CHES DUS 'KHOR RGYUD 'GREL 'CHAD PA'I YAN LAG TU MDZAD PA'I BSHAD THABS LA, RGYUD SDE'I ZAB DON SGO 'BYED RIN PO CHE GCES PA'I LDE MIG ,'GREL PA'I SA BCAD BSDUS DON DRI MED 'OD RGYAN, RGYUD 'GREL SKABS SU DGOS PA'I 'GAL SPONG, BSHAD THABS SGRA RIG MKHAS PA'I KHA RGYAN, MDOR BSDUS DANG PO'I t'IK SNYING PO SNANG BA'I 'OD ZER, BSHAD THABS NGES DON SNYE MA, GO LA'I RNAM BSHAD, RTZIS KYI BSTAN BCOS MKHAS PA DGA' BYED, RIGS SUM CU RTZA BDUN GYI RNAL 'BYOR MA MCHOD PA'I CHO GA RNAMS KYI LUNG ZHA LU MKHAN BRGYUD LTAR THOB PAS, LUNG GI STENG NAS BSHAD PA BYED PA'I SROL YOD PA LTAR, DE RNAMS GANG DU DGOS PA'I SKABS SU SBYAR NAS BSHAD PA RGYAS PA'I TSE, RGYUD KYI 'CHAD NYAN BYED PA LA NYE BAR MKHO BA'I YAN LAG RNAL 'BYOR MA MCHOD PA'I CHO GA SLOB MA RNAMS KYI DON DU ZIR GA LANG THA'I LUNG PAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RTZIS RIG SMRAS PA'I DBANG PO RTZIS RAMS PA DAR RGYAS KYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,)
